Definition: Abundance estimations of species per plot according to Braun-Blanquet (1964) and with Londo-scale (Londo 1976)
Comment: Braun-Blanquet J (1964) Pﬂanzensoziologie: Grundzüge der Vegetationskunde (3rd ed.). Wien-New York: Springer (Original work published 1928) / Londo G (1976) The decimal scale for releves of permanent quadrats. Vegetatio 33: 61–64. http://dx.doi.org/10.1007/BF00055300
